attributes.action: Bring back CAPITAL PUNISHMENT for SERIOUS CRIMES like RAPE,MURDER and terrorism!
attributes.additional_details:
We can dramatically reduce the rates of murder, violent assaults and sexual assaults against innocent people of the United Kingdom, bring back capital punishment! That would seriously teach people a lesson

Please share and get people to sign this petition!
attributes.background: I honestly feel really sick. On the news it said people have been arrested for sexual abuse on children....and babies. WHAT THE ??! BABIES? really? people like this should face trial for a death sentence! they have destroyed lives, people who murder should have their life taken away! eye for an eye!
